name: The Great Goblin Gobbler
description: A Thanksgiving feast gone awry as a gang of goblins steal all the turkeys and a legendary monster hides in the forest!
synopsis: The small village of Harvest's End is in a panic. The annual Thanksgiving feast is ruined when a gang of goblins steals all their prized turkeys. Worse yet, a terrifying monster has been stalking the forest, and the goblins seem to be working for it. The party is hired to retrieve the stolen turkeys, put an end to the goblins, and uncover the mystery of the forest beast. Along the way, they'll encounter strange goblin inventions, a chatty forest spirit, and a very hungry troll with a taste for poultry. This one-shot combines lighthearted humor with exciting combat and creative problem-solving.
plotHooks: A villager hires you to retrieve the stolen turkeys before the feast is ruined
The mayor offers a reward for uncovering the source of the goblin attacks
The local priestess asks you to drive away the evil in the forest
A goblin scout (captured by villagers) offers to lead you to the stolen turkeys if you spare his life

scenes.name: The Stolen Feast
scenes.description: The party arrives in Harvest's End to find the village in chaos. Turkeys are missing, the feast is ruined, and goblins are to blame. The mayor and villagers beg for help.

scenes.name: The Goblin Trail
scenes.description: The party follows the goblin tracks into the forest, encountering strange traps and devices along the way.

scenes.name: The Goblin Camp
scenes.description: The party finds the goblin camp and discovers that the goblins are working for a mysterious beast. The stolen turkeys are here, but so is trouble.

scenes.name: The Forest Beast
scenes.description: The party follows the clues to confront the mysterious beast that the goblins were working for - a massive, turkey-obsessed troll!

scenes.name: The Feast Restored
scenes.description: The party returns to Harvest's End with the turkeys and the news of the defeated troll. The village celebrates with a grand feast.

majorNPCs.name: Mayor Thaddeus Brannon
majorNPCs.background: The vain but well-meaning mayor of Harvest's End
majorNPCs.personality: A bit pompous but genuinely cares about the village's well-being. Constantly adjusting his fancy hat.
majorNPCs.motivation: To restore order and save the feasting traditions of the village
majorNPCs.appearance: A stout man with a round red face, always wearing an overly large mayoral hat
quirks: Adjusts his hat at least once every minute
Talks loudly to be heard in crowds
secrets: He secretly eats the leftovers from the feast each year
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A stout man in a fancy hat with a proud but slightly nervous expression

majorNPCs.name: Priestess Elara Moonwhisper
majorNPCs.background: The spiritual guide of Harvest's End who senses evil in the forest
majorNPCs.personality: Calm and wise, with a dry sense of humor. Speaks in riddles when nervous
majorNPCs.motivation: To protect the natural balance and uncover the source of corruption
majorNPCs.appearance: A tall, slender elf with silver hair and eyes like autumn leaves
secrets: She once had a brief romantic involvement with the village blacksmith
She foresees a great feast in the party's future
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: An elegant elf wearing leaf-patterned robes, surrounded by small woodland creatures

majorNPCs.name: Goblin Chief Rizzik
majorNPCs.background: The cunning leader of the goblin band, working for the mysterious beast
majorNPCs.personality: Sneaky and whiny, but fiercely loyal to his own kind. Loves shiny things and money.
majorNPCs.motivation: To steal as much as possible and make his goblins rich, even if it means working for a monster
majorNPCs.appearance: A dirty, gangly goblin with a tattered hat and a belt full of stolen trinkets
quirks: Blows a loud raspberry when surprised
Says 'uh-uh!' when he thinks he's outsmarted someone
secrets: He's terrified of the beast he's serving
He has a hidden hoard of stolen turkeys
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A grinning goblin surrounded by stolen loot, with a nervous look in his eyes

majorNPCs.name: Old Man Jenkins
majorNPCs.background: The village's grumpiest resident who raised all the stolen turkeys
majorNPCs.personality: Cranky and sarcastic, but deep down cares about his animals. Has a soft spot for adventurers.
majorNPCs.motivation: To get his turkeys back and protect his flock from harm
majorNPCs.appearance: A wiry old man with a permanent scowl and a tattered hat
secrets: He had a pet turkey that helped him through hard times
He knows more about the forest than he lets on
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A grumpy old man leaning on a pitchfork, surrounded by turkeys

majorNPCs.name: Twitchy Tim
majorNPCs.background: A captured goblin who offers to lead the party to the turkeys for his freedom
majorNPCs.personality: Nervous, twitchy, and prone to random outbursts. Easily startled and distractable.
majorNPCs.motivation: To survive and get back to his goblin kin, even if it means working with adventurers
majorNPCs.appearance: A scrawny goblin with bulging eyes and twitchy fingers, wearing mismatched armor
secrets: He's actually a pretty good cook
He once had a human friend
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A twitchy goblin with wide eyes, holding a crude map and looking around nervously
